description: The PAT_GROUP table contains information about patient groups. This table will hold groups used for scheduling as well as groups used for clinical documentation.

columns.name: PAT_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient group record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the record status of the group record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Deleted


Inactive and Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden


Inactive Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: PAT_GROUP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item defines the type of GRP record and whether or not this record stores a list of EPT IDs or a list of EPT CSNs.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Scheduling Group


Clinical Scheduled Group


Episode Group

columns.name: CONTACT_LIST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item describes the type of group that is being documented by clinical users.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: GROUP_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that a group was started.

columns.name: GROUP_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant when a group ended.

columns.name: CREATED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user ID for the user that created a group.

columns.name: GROUP_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department (linked to DEP) where the group took place.
